pageContext.claim: “There's never been anybody treated in the history of Congress as badly as Brett Kavanaugh, and he's an innocent man.”
pageContext.analysis: Congress has a long history of treating people poorly — from the impeachments of former presidents to Anita Hill to the McCarthy hearings — a highly-public but relatively short investigation into Kavanaugh’s past may have been embarrassing, but it does not rank among Congress’s most aggressive investigations.
